desc: Lemon Tree Corners has a treasure trove of vintage pieces and are located at the Williamsburg Lazy Daisy, 3032 Richmond Road, Williamsburg, VA. Along with our upcycled Furniture and Garden Art, we also carry a wonderful collection of quality products for your creative needs. Debi’s Design Diary DIY, IOD, and JRV.

layout.text: We have been vintage before vintage was cool.
ESTABLISHED IN 1975 - ALL THINGS HOME, DECOR, AND PAINT!
